scripts.wasm:build:debug:simd: cd ../wasm && RUSTFLAGS='--cfg=web_sys_unstable_apis -C target-feature=+simd128' wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir ../web/src/wasm/pkg --debug && cd ../web
scripts.wasm:build:debug:nosimd: cd ../wasm && RUSTFLAGS='--cfg=web_sys_unstable_apis' wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir ../web/src/wasm/pkg-nosimd --debug && cd ../web
scripts.wasm:build:debug: npm run wasm:build:debug:simd && npm run wasm:build:debug:nosimd
scripts.wasm:build:release:simd: cd ../wasm && RUSTFLAGS='--cfg=web_sys_unstable_apis -C target-feature=+simd128' wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir ../web/src/wasm/pkg --release && cd ../web
scripts.wasm:build:release:nosimd: cd ../wasm && cp Cargo.toml Cargo.toml.bak && sed -i.tmp 's/--enable-simd,//' Cargo.toml && RUSTFLAGS='--cfg=web_sys_unstable_apis' wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir ../web/src/wasm/pkg-nosimd --release && mv Cargo.toml.bak Cargo.toml && rm -f Cargo.toml.tmp && cd ../web
scripts.wasm:build:release: npm run wasm:build:release:simd && npm run wasm:build:release:nosimd
